data.comment: The first-half is under way at Guldensporenstadion - Beerschot kick-off to start the match.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Michiel Jonckheere.
In the minute 8, It's now 2-0 in Kortrijk as Faiz Selemani scores for Kortrijk.
Yan Vorogovskiy (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
Beerschot make their first substitution with Pierre Bourdin replacing Yan Vorogovskiy.
In the minute 39, Pierre Bourdin (Beerschot) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Guldensporenstadion.
At Guldensporenstadion, Ryan Sanusi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Kortrijk kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
An attacking Beerschot player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Raphael Holzhauser scores from the spot to level the match at 2-2.
In the minute 50, Beerschot take a 2-3 lead thanks to Tarik Tissoudali.
Kortrijk have been awarded a penalty...
Ilombe Mboyo levels the score at 3-3 from the penalty spot.
In the minute 68, Goal! Kortrijk take a 4-3 lead through a well-placed header from Habib Gueye.
Goal! Pierre Bourdin levels the match at 4-4.
Marius Noubissi is replacing Ryan Sanusi for the away team.
In the minute 75, Jovan Stojanovic is replacing Michiel Jonckheere for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.
Mohamed Badamosi is on a sub for Habib Gueye for Kortrijk.
Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a third substitution, with Mohamed Halaimia replacing Musashi Suzuki.
In the minute 84, Trent Sainsbury (Kortrijk) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
Julien De Sart (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
Beerschot's Frederic Frans scores with his head to give his side a 4-5 lead.
The match is over. Final score 5-5.
The home team replace Mohamed Badamosi with Yani Van Den Bossche.
Trent Sainsbury is on target to level the scores at 5-5.
